project.teaser: Cyprus and Malta, being small islands with similar needs, will leverage on the work that they have been doing with EIT Climate-KIC to bring all the relevant partners together, exchange ideas, organize workshop and prepare action plans in the innovation field of their National...
project.objective: Cyprus and Malta, being small islands with similar needs, will leverage on the work that they have been doing with EIT Climate-KIC to bring all the relevant partners together, exchange ideas, organize workshop and prepare action plans in the innovation field of their National Energy and Climate Plans.
project.title: Mediterranean Island Cleantech Innovation Ecosystem
project.keywords: Mediterranean islands, cleantech ecosystem, national energy and climate plans

article.title: Island innovation pathways to fight climate change in Cyprus and Malta

result.title: Action Plan Template
result.description: This deliverable will include the skeleton structure of an action plan that can be used by other regions

result.title: Communication-Dissemination-Exploitation Plan
result.description: This deliverable will set out the strategy for communicating the projects objectives

result.title: Website and Social Media
result.description: This deliverable is related to the establishment of the online presence of the project

result.title: Action Plan - Cyprus
result.description: This deliverable will describe the concrete measures Cyprus has to take to meet its objectives

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 2 - MICIE (Mediterranean Island Cleantech Innovation Ecosystem)
result.teaser: To meet the EU’s energy and climate targets for 2030, EU countries established a 10-year National Energy and Climate Plan (NECP) for the period from 2021 to 2030. Cyprus and Malta, as Member State, submitted their NECPs, setting out a strategy and supporting targets for...
result.description: periodic

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Communication-Dissemination-Exploitation Activities Report
result.description: This deliverable will report on the communication activities carried out by M9 and M18 respectively

result.title: Meeting Reports
result.description: D12 Meeting reports M1 M9 M18 This deliverable will document all the outcomes of the Projects meetings

result.title: Final Project Publication
result.description: This deliverable will constitute a report on the overall projects activities

result.title: Report on pathways identification in case studies
result.description: This deliverable will include information about the relevant innovation leaders and strong innovators and the conclusion drawn from them

result.title: Actions' Evaluation Report
result.description: This deliverable will constitute a report on the overall projects activities and whether the quality of these actions is aligned with innovation leaders and strong innovators regionscountries

result.title: Report on Project Continuation
result.description: This deliverable will constitute a report on the consortium composition and pathways towards the long term enforcement of the Action Plan

result.title: Final Report
result.description: This deliverable will document the overall results of the Project

result.title: Workshop Report
result.description: This deliverable will document the work carried out in the workshops and will include the list of participants screenshots of the filledin canvases and the overall results

result.title: Report on Governance analysis
result.description: This deliverable will include information about the analysis of the current governance situation in Cyprus and Malta

result.title: Presentation of Action Plans
result.description: This deliverable will include a brief presentation of the action plans and action plan template prepared under D41 to D43

result.title: Project Management Plan
result.description: This deliverable will include information on the project activities and responsibilities of each partner

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: This deliverable will describe the Findability, Accessibility, Interoperability, and Reuse (FAIR principles) of MICIE digital assets of the project according to the European Data Strategy and the Horizon 2020 Open Research Data Pilot (ORD).

result.title: Quality Assurance Plan
result.description: This deliverable will set out the protocol of how all actionsworkshopsreports need to be organizedstructured and the mechanism to monitor the progress of the workload in order to maintain a high standard

result.title: Report on Stakeholder Mapping
result.description: This deliverable will include information about all the stakeholders identified and their interconnections

result.title: Action Plan - Malta
result.description: This deliverable will describe the concrete measures Malta has to take to meet its objectives

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
